name: The Interrogation
description:
You are trapped. There is the void and there is the light. You must choose, you must accept or deny.  You will burn or you will fade away.  You cannot escape.

***
This is Baby's first Twine Game.  I made this game to get a feel for the program and tried to make it as simple as I could. I'm curious  what you folk think and would appreciate feedback, below.

Also, I'm on Twitter as @WriterHomier  and if you like the game I'd really appreciate it if you could spread the word.
